hindi:
माला फेरत जुग भया, फिरा न मन का फेर।
कर का मनका डारि के, मन का मनका फेर।
english:
Mala ferat jug bhaya, fira na man ka fer.
Kar ka manka daari ke, man ka manka fer.
translation:
You have been turning the rosary for ages, but the mind's cycle hasn't changed.
Drop the rosary beads and turn the beads of your mind instead.
